verses.name: John 11:16
verses.text: Then said Thomas, which is called Didymus, unto his fellowdisciples, Let us also go, that we may die with him.

verses.name: John 11:17
verses.text: Then when Jesus came, he found that he had lain in the grave four days already.

verses.name: John 11:18
verses.text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem, about fifteen furlongs off:

verses.name: John 11:19
verses.text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary, to comfort them concerning their brother.

verses.name: John 11:20
verses.text: Then Martha, as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming, went and met him: but Mary sat still in the house.

verses.name: John 11:21
verses.text: Then said Martha unto Jesus, Lord, if thou hadst been here, my brother had not died.
